locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.
locations.category: Truck Stop, Public Facility, Public Facility

showerReviews.reviewText: Perfect customer service at 3 am Diana was funy , professional ,and very nice. The shower is big, very clean water is  hot with awesome pressure  i wish all Flying J were like this one . Thank you, all employees, for doing a great job.

… from an employee on break 😀 and with a repeated effort he was able to get it opened 👍 and I couldn't afford to pay for a shower for my kid's and I but a nice trucker who saw I had kid's decided to help us out and 4 of us took a shower and …
Place is nice and clean. I went to take a shower and the clerk asked me if I wanted an extra towel and he was super friendly. That does not happen at every flying j

Luv, there is a shower we can use and don't need to be a truck driver. $17.00 for one shower is a reasonable price, and it was a big shower . Thank you, owner, for having a nice setup. The shower makes the trip even better.
5 stars on the shower kinda ridiculous on the price thou over 18$ I believe for it. But yeh very clean very nice
Shower was good they got a game room one of the best i done seen fuel pump clean parking lot is jump no lizards damn but it was a great place to pump fuel

Lot's of places offer gas and food but here you can get diesel and Subway sandwiches for the road. You can also reserve a spot for your semi and trailer. Free shower is included for the reservation stay.
… ...but a TIP box(it's looks more like a homeless barging cup) for shower?! …
Great customer service, clean shower and clean place
… The lot is Clean well as clean as a truck stop lot can be. The bathrooms were clean. I did not have time for a shower. Great place good people.  Keep up the great work.
Worst service around night for showers, i was around 9-10 pm waiting one hour …

… the semi truck parking lot doesn’t reek of pee. Clean showers, although shower number 5 ran out of hot water halfway through my shower which wasn’t pleasant on hair washing day in 30° weather. I’m going to give grace bc maybe I was just …

One person doing a two man job in busy hours. Cleaning the shower(s) and helping the customers at the counter while the supervisor or manager is seating in the office. Someone should stay in the counter while the other staff is cleaning the …

The workers at 3 are standing at 2 checkouts and are not cleaning the shower stalls. Although there are many free ones that need to be cleaned. How do I know this? I've been standing first in line for almost an hour. That's what kind of …

Shower is always cold i talked to store manager about it and no changes, and the mechanic manager is a disrespectful person

The worst loves ever
The shower facilities are clean and well-maintained. The service is good and staff are friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this place.
Water Was Hot Enough To Steam The Mirror, Also With Good Pressure, Shower Was Clean $16.00 But Worth It, Could Use More Shelving In The Shower But Was Overall A Good Shower 🚿 Id Recommended …
Shower was clean but the water went cold mid shower. Good luck finding parking there tho
They sell salads with no dressing.. a shower for 18 bucks? Is the water imported from china? What a high priced joke

… stopped here several times before and I’ve not been disappointed. There is plenty of parking but it fills up quickly. Since this place is pretty busy don’t be surprised if you have to wait in line for things; checkout, Carls JR, a shower.

locations.showerReviewSummary: 10 shower-related reviews found. Generally Positive mentions of: shower, clean, bathroom
